-- Create the external file format
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

-- Create the external data source
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'calembel_gondor2_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [calembel_gondor2_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://calembel@gondor2.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

-- Drop table if needed
/*
drop EXTERNAL TABLE externalip
*/

-- Create external table
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE externalip (
	[update-date-time] nvarchar(4000),
	[external-ip-address] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = '01-raw/hybridenv/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [calembel_gondor2_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


-- Return all records
select * FROM dbo.externalip;

-- Return all but cast the datetime column AS datetime
SELECT 
	 CAST([update-date-time] as datetime) as [update-date-time]
	,[external-ip-address]
FROM dbo.externalip;


-- :: Return only the latest record

-- Create view
create view vLatestExternalIp as
select 
	 CAST(a.[update-date-time] as datetime) as [update-date-time]
	,a.[external-ip-address]
from dbo.externalip a
inner join (
    select max(CAST([update-date-time] as datetime)) as MaxDate
    from dbo.externalip) b
on 
	CAST(a.[update-date-time] as datetime) = b.MaxDate;
GO


-- Query view
select * from vLatestExternalIp;
